Key Features

Full HD 1080p Resolution

Edge-to-Edge Multi-Touch System

ConX Whiteboard Supported

Windows 10 Pro Operating System

Intel Core i7 Processor with 256GB SSD

Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Included

InFocus Mondopad INF5522AG

Out of stock

Guaranteed Safe Checkout

Description

Reviews (0)

The InFocus Mondopad INF5522AG HD Display from InFocus is a video conferencing and collaboration solution used for efficient face-to-face collaboration with people anywhere. This anti-glare, touchscreen display has full HD 1080p resolution and features an edge-to-edge multi-touch system with support for 10-point gestures.

This Mondopad allows you to brainstorm, capture, save, and share your ideas on an interactive whiteboard. ConX Whiteboard is supported, which enables you and co-workers in other locations to interact and share ideas on a Mondopad whiteboard at the same time. Share content securely from PCs, Macs, tablets, or smartphones to make meetings collaborative, productive, and sustainable. An Intel Core i7 processor with a 256GB SSD and a full version of Microsoft Office are included. A wireless keyboard and mouse are included as well.

Interactive Whiteboard

Brainstorm, capture, save, and share your ideas on an interactive whiteboard without borders or barriers. Use a complete collection of digital pens, shapes, lines, and colors on a canvas up to 100-display screens in size; paste and annotate backgrounds and images, then email directly from the Mondopad.

View, Annotate, and Share

You can take notes on anything you’re presenting and then save and email your changes. You can mark-up documents, images, web pages, or videos, and manage common or secure files through email, office network, USB drives, and cloud-based services like Dropbox.

Brainstorm and Share Ideas Through the Cloud

This Mondopad supports ConX Whiteboard. This enables you and co-workers in other locations to interact and share ideas on a Mondopad whiteboard at the same time. By using your Mondopad and your ConX Cloud login credentials you can join a ConX Whiteboard session and start drawing. Everyone will see the same whiteboard screen, and each participant can draw or write in a different color or they can insert text or images. If you’re already on a ConX Cloud video call, hit “join” and the ConX Whiteboard will appear allowing you to see and hear co-workers while sharing and editing your ideas at the same time. ConX Whiteboard works either in conjunction with ConX Cloud, or on its own with any other video.

Video Connect to the World

The video calling service is included for the first year, allowing you to make and receive video calls or add your own video conferencing client onto the Mondopad as you would on any other PC. You can bring groups of people together with the ConX Cloud and the users can connect from any device, anywhere. Subscriptions are available ranging from three seats up to 100 virtual meeting rooms, each with 50 seats.

Bring Your Own Device

You can connect and share content securely from PCs, Macs, tablets, or smartphones to make meetings collaborative, productive, and sustainable. By casting your device’s screen to the Mondopad and viewing up to four AirPlay or Chrome casts simultaneously you can control the Mondopad with your device from anywhere in the room.
